module PlutusExample.ScriptContextChecker
data AnyCustomRedeemer
AnyPV1CustomRedeemer :: PV1CustomRedeemer -> AnyCustomRedeemer
AnyPV2CustomRedeemer :: PV2CustomRedeemer -> AnyCustomRedeemer
customRedeemerToScriptData :: AnyCustomRedeemer -> ScriptData
data ScriptContextError
NoScriptsInByronEra :: ScriptContextError
NoScriptsInEra :: ScriptContextError
ReadTxBodyError :: FileError TextEnvelopeError -> ScriptContextError
IntervalConvError :: Text -> ScriptContextError
AcquireFail :: AcquiringFailure -> ScriptContextError
NoTipLocalStateError :: ScriptContextError
NoSystemStartTimeError :: ScriptContextError
EnvVarSocketErr :: EnvSocketError -> ScriptContextError
ScriptContextErrorByronEra :: ScriptContextError
QueryError :: ShelleyQueryCmdError -> ScriptContextError
ConsensusModeMismatch :: AnyConsensusMode -> AnyCardanoEra -> ScriptContextError
EraMismatch :: !EraMismatch -> ScriptContextError
PlutusV2TranslationError :: TranslationError StandardCrypto -> ScriptContextError
MoreThanOneTxInput :: ScriptContextError
createAnyCustomRedeemer :: forall era lang. PlutusScriptVersion lang -> ShelleyBasedEra era -> ProtocolParameters -> UTxO era -> EpochInfo (Either Text) -> SystemStart -> Tx era -> Either ScriptContextError AnyCustomRedeemer
seqToList :: StrictSeq a -> [a]
createAnyCustomRedeemerFromTxFp :: PlutusScriptVersion lang -> FilePath -> AnyConsensusModeParams -> NetworkId -> ExceptT ScriptContextError IO AnyCustomRedeemer
createAnyCustomRedeemerBsFromTxFp :: PlutusScriptVersion lang -> FilePath -> AnyConsensusModeParams -> NetworkId -> ExceptT ScriptContextError IO ByteString
getSbe :: CardanoEraStyle era -> ExceptT ScriptContextError IO (ShelleyBasedEra era)
fromPlutusTxId :: TxId -> TxId StandardCrypto

dummyCerts :: [DCert]
dummyTxIns :: [TxInInfo]
dummySignatories :: [PubKeyHash]
dummyDatumHashes :: [(DatumHash, Datum)]

dummyScriptPurpose :: Maybe ScriptPurpose

sampleTestV2ScriptContextDataJSON :: ByteString
instance GHC.Classes.Eq PlutusExample.ScriptContextChecker.AnyCustomRedeemer
instance GHC.Show.Show PlutusExample.ScriptContextChecker.AnyCustomRedeemer
